Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Little Mule
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description: Nomads, as the name suggests, don’t linger too long in any one place. They’re constantly on the move and that means bringing their belongings with them. It comes as no wonder the truck-bed variant of the Colby has become so popular with them. Little Mule — that’s what they call this Thorton Colby model. But beyond the name, they also swap out the standard engines for stronger ones, add light armor to the body and install an environment projection system based on CrystalDome tech in the cabin.
